_header: At Salford [Sifford] sat theigns many / many Bishops
Note: For four lines occurring separately see 3405.
_description: The Proverbs of Alfred — in alliterative unrhymed verse

OxfJesus29.First Lines:
At Seuorde sete þeynes monye fele Biscopes and feole bok
                    ileredEorles prute knyhtes egleche þar wes þe eorl
                    Alurich…
OxfJesus29.Last Lines:
…Þe mon þe spareþ yeorde and yonge child and let hit
                    arixlyeÞat he hit areche ne may þat him schal on ealde sore
                    reowe
OxfJesus29.Attributed Title:
Incipiunt documenta Regis Alurede (f. 189); Expliciunt dicta Regis Aluredi
                    (f. 192)

CamTCC323.First Lines:
At siforde setin kinhis moniefele biscopis & fele booc
                    lerede…
CamTCC323.Last Lines:
…þuru þis lore & gentelerihe amendit huge
                    companie
